frontpage.hero.title: Find and get access to the data you need, when you need it
frontpage.hero.ingress: Data Marketplace makes it easy to search for and request access to the data you need to do your job. Venenatis ipsum aliquet nibh at. Risus sapien erat vitae amet leo lobortis maecenas.
search.statistic: {count, plural, =0 {We were not able to find anything related to “{searchTerm}”} one {# result} other {# results}}
terms.ingress:
These terms and conditions create a contract between you as a data consumer and the data provider (the “Agreement”).

When you are provided access to this Data Product, you will have to ensure that the following criteria are met:
terms.acceptLabel: I accept the Terms of Use
terms.banner.danger.description2: Data from these Data Products can only be shared with restricted groups within Equinor. External sharing is prohibited.
checkout.access.headline: Why do you want access?
checkout.access.ingress: Please provide a short description explaining why you want access.
checkout.access.exampleBody: As a [role] I want [description of what you want to do with the data product], so that [description of why you need the data product]
checkout.access.descriptionInput.label: Description
checkout.confirm.terms: You have accepted to adhere to the Terms of Use for the following Data Products:
checkout.confirm.description: And you told us that you need them for the following purpose:
checkout.redirect.headline: Redirecting to AccessIT
checkout.redirect.ingress: You'll now get redirected to AccessIT to complete the request process.
checkout.redirect.body: If you don't get redirected within 15 seconds, please click this link: {link}
cart.headline: Cart {count, plural, =0 {is empty} one {(# item)} other {(# items)}}
cart.banner.warning: Access to these data products requires a VPN connection
